body: Hmm, sorry, I was too hasty about this. Question is if we have that operand supported at all.
This looks like a case of using Expression as a $column argument for InCondition - this is not supported, it should be `string|string[]`.

issue.title: allow expression in IN builder for columns

repository.name: yii2
